title: Wall St Week Ahead Some investors wary of 'buying the dip' as Ukraine, Fed gyrate stocks
description: U.S. stocks are drawing buyers after a recent tumble, but some investors believe buying the dip this time may be a far riskier bet than in the past.
content:
NEW YORK, Feb 25 (Reuters) - U.S. stocks are drawing buyers after a recent tumble, but some investors believe buying the dip this time may be a far riskier bet than in the past.
